BP_Action_LaserRifle

Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Maps/Advanced/Actions/BP_Action_LaserRifle

.. cpp:class:: BP_Action_LaserRifle : public BP_Action_C

Shoots a laser beam at the target location, displaying damage to any hit targets if specified.
